General.Name: InBioGen Co Ltd
General.Description: INBIOGEN CO.Ltd manufactures and sells footwear for children, youth, and adults in South Korea and internationally. The company markets its products under the ARTIS, SPECS, WANGJA, NEOSPEC, and CHAMPION brands. The company was formerly known as BTONE CO.,Ltd. INBIOGEN CO.Ltd was founded in 1949 and is based in Pyeongtaek, South Korea.
